coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the plate reads 'S.G.C. Provisions'
coreAttributes.name: Mystery Platter
coreAttributes.description: This plate of unidentifiable hash looks really messy, but strangely smells very good. A take-away from a late-night diner, popular with roach-morphs on the night shift.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the plastic cover and [npc.verb(breathe)] in the meaty smell of the hash. Unable to resist the delicious looking meal, [npc.she] eagerly [npc.verb(start)] wolfing it all down and you [npc.verb(empty)] the tray in moments.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] plastic cover from the plate and [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc2.herHim] to [npc2.verb(breathe)] in the meaty smell of the hash. Unable to resist the delicious-looking meal, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] wolfing it all down and [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(empty)] the tray in moments.
